greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decimal expansion of the solution to (1 + x)*x^x = (1 - x)^x.
mathematica: Take[RealDigits[x /. FindRoot[(1 + x)*x^x == (1 - x)^x, {x, 1/2}, WorkingPrecision -> 120], 10][[1]], 105] (* _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Apr 17 2018 *)
results.author: _Juri-Stepan Gerasimov_, Apr 16 2018
ext: More digits from _Alois P. Heinz_, Apr 16 2018
